text: ELIGIBLE if all predicates true; otherwise INELIGIBLE.
Default CF = 0.47 t C per t d.m. (trees and shrubs).
If a pool is excluded from boundary, set its ΔCO2e := 0 by rule.
Net_project = (dCO2e_AGB + dCO2e_BGB + dCO2e_DOM + dCO2e_Litter + dCO2e_SOC) - leakage
Revisit plots every RevisitInterval years using consistent mensuration protocol.
If RelativePrecision > 10 then apply uncertainty discount per U-table.
Maintain SOPs and QA/QC per national inventory guidance or IPCC GPG; record all monitored parameters at each verification.
Default CF = 0.47 t C per t d.m. (trees and shrubs).

Net_project = (dCO2e_AGB + dCO2e_BGB + dCO2e_DOM + dCO2e_Litter + dCO2e_SOC) - leakage
